resources.name: List users - 200
resources.description:
**Description**

Return all users. User must be authenticated to return other users.

**REQ** 

no body

**RES** - 200
```
{
	"count": 1,
	"next": null,
	"previous": null,
	"results": [
		{
			"id": "8940989f-bd8d-4498-9eda-d806b62b04da",
			"name": "vito",
			"email": "vito@email.com",
			"private_profile": true
		}
	]
}
```

resources.name: List users by name - 200
resources.description:
**Description**

Return all users filtering by name. User must be authenticated to return other users.

**REQ** 

no body

**RES** - 200
```
{
	"count": 1,
	"next": null,
	"previous": null,
	"results": [
		{
			"id": "8940989f-bd8d-4498-9eda-d806b62b04da",
			"name": "vito",
			"email": "vito@email.com",
			"private_profile": true
		}
	]
}
```

resources.name: List user profile - 200
resources.description:
**Description**

Return authenticated user profile.

**REQ** 

no body

**RES** - 200
```
{
	"id": "10852491-f5ce-4d85-a8fc-43d913ea77e6",
	"name": "igo",
	"email": "igo@email.com",
	"private_profile": false
}
```

resources.name: Login - 200
resources.description:
**Description**

Login with already registered user.

**REQ** - JSON
```
{
	"email": "igo@email.com",
	"password": "123456"
}
```

**RES** - 200
```
{
	"refresh": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ0b2tlbl90eXBlIjoicmVmcmVzaCIsImV4cCI6MTY2NDQwNzYyMiwiaWF0IjoxNjYzODAyODIyLCJqdGkiOiI4ZTc1N2Q2ZGE2NjA0YjM0YjhjNThmNjNmY2I2NDdjMyIsInVzZXJfaWQiOiIxMDg1MjQ5MS1mNWNlLTRkODUtYThmYy00M2Q5MTNlYTc3ZTYifQ.cdCQkKEmPARXGyZ-Wf6jHNW0FfQ9CwDj6SNML00JkiI",
	"access": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ0b2tlbl90eXBlIjoiYWNjZXNzIiwiZXhwIjoxNjYzODg5MjIyLCJpYXQiOjE2NjM4MDI4MjIsImp0aSI6IjE0MDVhYTZkNjg2MTQwZDdiYTg3M2Q2OGJmNmY2YWZjIiwidXNlcl9pZCI6IjEwODUyNDkxLWY1Y2UtNGQ4NS1hOGZjLTQzZDkxM2VhNzdlNiJ9.Nuk-TCBTenMimuF5BpiMcxVDdP8QbLbSfiKCN9Zw1mI"
}
```

resources.name: Register user  - 201
resources.description:
**Description**

Register new user.

**REQ** - JSON
```
{
	"name": "igo",
	"password": "123456",
	"email": "igo@email.com",
	"private_profile": false
}
```

**RES** - 201
```
{
	"id": "10852491-f5ce-4d85-a8fc-43d913ea77e6",
	"name": "igo",
	"email": "igo@email.com",
	"private_profile": false
}
```

resources.name: Update user profile - 200
resources.description:
**Description**

Update authenticated user profile.

**REQ** - JSON
```
{
	"private_profile": false
}
```

**RES** - 200
```
{
	"id": "8940989f-bd8d-4498-9eda-d806b62b04da",
	"name": "vito",
	"email": "vito@email.com",
	"private_profile": false
}
```

resources.name: Delete user profile - 204
resources.description:
**Description**

Delete authenticated user profile.

**REQ**

no body

**RES** - 204

resources.name: List posts - 200
List posts by tag_name - 200
resources.description:
**Description**

Return posts filtering by post tag name.

**REQ** - Params

Url examples:

Must be exact name
```
{{ _.baseURL }}/post?tag_name=Culinária
```

**RES** - 200
```
{
	"count": 1,
	"next": null,
	"previous": null,
	"results": [
		{
			"id": "{% uuid 'v4' %}",
			"description": "post about fun while cooking",
			"tags": [
				{
					"name": "Culinária"
				}
			],
			"medias": [
				{
					"id": "bbaf362a-33cb-4f7f-a393-f7da10af4250",
					"mimetype": "JPG",
					"thumbnail": "http://localhost:8000/media/thumbnails/Victor_Ramon_thumb.jpeg",
					"media": "http://localhost:8000/media/post_medias/Victor_Ramon.jpg"
				},
				{
					"id": "0c28393f-4e15-43d9-8559-140d808ac526",
					"mimetype": "JPG",
					"thumbnail": "http://localhost:8000/media/thumbnails/bca8cddf81b31c4662164080cbf98c16_thumb.jpeg",
					"media": "http://localhost:8000/media/post_medias/bca8cddf81b31c4662164080cbf98c16.jpg"
				}
			],
			"owner": "{% uuid 'v4' %}",
			"created_at": "2022-09-25T14:07:51.169469Z",
			"updated_at": "{% now 'iso-8601', '' %}"
		}
	]
}
```

resources.name: List posts by mimetype - 200
List posts by upload_date_range - 200
resources.description:
**Description**

Return posts filtering by post upload date range. Date format -> yyyy-mm-dd

**REQ** - Params

Url examples:

After date
```
{{ _.baseURL }}/post?upload_date_after=2022-09-25
```
Before date
```
{{ _.baseURL }}/post?upload_date_before=2022-09-26
```
Range (params order doesn't matter)
```
{{ _.baseURL }}/post?upload_date_before=2022-09-26&upload_date_after=2022-09-22
```

**RES** - 200
```
{
	"count": 1,
	"next": null,
	"previous": null,
	"results": [
		{
			"id": "{% uuid 'v4' %}",
			"description": "post about fun while cooking",
			"tags": [
				{
					"name": "Culinária"
				}
			],
			"medias": [
				{
					"id": "bbaf362a-33cb-4f7f-a393-f7da10af4250",
					"mimetype": "JPG",
					"thumbnail": "http://localhost:8000/media/thumbnails/Victor_Ramon_thumb.jpeg",
					"media": "http://localhost:8000/media/post_medias/Victor_Ramon.jpg"
				},
				{
					"id": "0c28393f-4e15-43d9-8559-140d808ac526",
					"mimetype": "JPG",
					"thumbnail": "http://localhost:8000/media/thumbnails/bca8cddf81b31c4662164080cbf98c16_thumb.jpeg",
					"media": "http://localhost:8000/media/post_medias/bca8cddf81b31c4662164080cbf98c16.jpg"
				}
			],
			"owner": "{% uuid 'v4' %}",
			"created_at": "2022-09-25T14:07:51.169469Z",
			"updated_at": "{% now 'iso-8601', '' %}"
		}
	]
}
```

resources.name: List posts by searching tag name - 200
resources.description:
**Description**

Return posts filtering by tag name search.

**REQ** - Params

Url examples:

Exact name (insensitive case)
```
{{ _.baseURL }}/post?search=culinária  or  {{ _.baseURL }}/post?search=CULINÁRIA
```
Starting with
```
{{ _.baseURL }}/post?search=culi
```
Ending with
```
{{ _.baseURL }}/post?search=nária
```
Containing
```
{{ _.baseURL }}/post?search=ná
```

**RES** - 200
```
{
	"count": 1,
	"next": null,
	"previous": null,
	"results": [
		{
			"id": "{% uuid 'v4' %}",
			"description": "post about fun while cooking",
			"tags": [
				{
					"name": "Culinária"
				}
			],
			"medias": [
				{
					"id": "bbaf362a-33cb-4f7f-a393-f7da10af4250",
					"mimetype": "JPG",
					"thumbnail": "http://localhost:8000/media/thumbnails/Victor_Ramon_thumb.jpeg",
					"media": "http://localhost:8000/media/post_medias/Victor_Ramon.jpg"
				},
				{
					"id": "0c28393f-4e15-43d9-8559-140d808ac526",
					"mimetype": "JPG",
					"thumbnail": "http://localhost:8000/media/thumbnails/bca8cddf81b31c4662164080cbf98c16_thumb.jpeg",
					"media": "http://localhost:8000/media/post_medias/bca8cddf81b31c4662164080cbf98c16.jpg"
				}
			],
			"owner": "{% uuid 'v4' %}",
			"created_at": "{% now 'iso-8601', '' %}",
			"updated_at": "{% now 'iso-8601', '' %}"
		}
	]
}
```

resources.name: Create new post - 201
resources.description:
**Description**

Creates a new post. User must be authenticated to create.

**REQ** - Multipart/formdata

Must be sent a multiform data with pairs of keys and values,
in case of multiple values just repeat the key and type the
other value. Keys example:
```
    key                      value
description      ->      some description
post_tags        ->      Diversão
post_tags        ->      Culinária
post_medias      ->      Victor Ramon.png
post_medias      ->      some_file.jpg
```

**RES** - 201
```
{
	"id": "{% uuid 'v4' %}",
	"description": "post about fun while cooking",
	"tags": [
		{
			"name": "Diversão"
		},
		{
			"name": "Culinária"
		}
	],
	"medias": [
		{
			"id": "bbaf362a-33cb-4f7f-a393-f7da10af4250",
			"mimetype": "JPG",
			"thumbnail": "http://localhost:8000/media/thumbnails/Victor_Ramon_thumb.jpeg",
			"media": "http://localhost:8000/media/post_medias/Victor_Ramon.jpg"
		},
		{
			"id": "0c28393f-4e15-43d9-8559-140d808ac526",
			"mimetype": "JPG",
			"thumbnail": "http://localhost:8000/media/thumbnails/bca8cddf81b31c4662164080cbf98c16_thumb.jpeg",
			"media": "http://localhost:8000/media/post_medias/bca8cddf81b31c4662164080cbf98c16.jpg"
		}
	],
	"owner": "{% uuid 'v4' %}",
	"created_at": "{% now 'iso-8601', '' %}",
	"updated_at": "{% now 'iso-8601', '' %}"
}
```

resources.name: Update post - 200
resources.description:
**Description**

Updates a post. User must be owner to update. When updating post tags or post medias notice that the old tags/medias will be replaced by the new ones.

**REQ** - Multipart/formdata

Must be sent a multiform data with pairs of keys and values,
in case of multiple values just repeat the key and type the
other value. Keys example:
```
    key                      value
description      ->      some description
post_tags        ->      Diversão
post_tags        ->      Culinária   
post_medias      ->      some_file.jpg
```

**REQ** - 200
```
{
	"id": "{% uuid 'v4' %}",
	"description": "post about fun while cooking",
	"tags": [
		{
			"name": "Culinária"
		},
		{
			"name": "Diversão"
		}
	],
	"medias": [
		{
			"id": "{% uuid 'v4' %}",
			"mimetype": "JPG",
			"thumbnail": "http://localhost:8000/media/thumbnails/bca8cddf81b31c4662164080cbf98c16_thumb_1DOEwS0.jpeg",
			"media": "http://localhost:8000/media/post_medias/bca8cddf81b31c4662164080cbf98c16_un48Ijt.jpg"
		}
	],
	"owner": "{% uuid 'v4' %}",
	"created_at": "{% now 'iso-8601', '' %}",
	"updated_at": "{% now 'iso-8601', '' %}"
}
```

resources.name: Delete post - 204
resources.description:
**Description**

Deletes a post. User must be owner to delete.

**REQ**

no body

**REQ** - 204

resources.name: List tags - 200
List tags by name - 200
resources.description:
**Description**

Return tag filtering by name.

**REQ**

no body

**RES** - 200
```
{
	"count": 1,
	"next": null,
	"previous": null,
	"results": [
		{
			"id": "229a4431-d7c8-4e13-9d33-3ee84fc74fea",
			"name": "Diversão"
		}
	]
}
```

resources.name: Create new tag - 201
resources.description:
**Description**

Creates new tag. User must be authenticated to create.

**RES** - JSON
```
{
	"name": "Culinária"
}
```

**REQ** - 201
```
{
	"id": "68f12740-d112-4212-bf03-0208831816e8",
	"name": "Culinária"
}
```
